original_text: He was very cruel to our ancestors and he caused them to suffer. When new babies were born, he said that our people must put them out of their homes. He said that because he wanted the babies to die.
korean_text: 그가 우리 족속에게 교활한 방법을 써서 조상들을 괴롭게 하여 그 어린 아이들을 내버려 살지 못하게 하려 할새

sentences.original_text: He was very cruel to our ancestors
and he caused them to suffer
he said that our people must put them out of their homes
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 백성이 그들을 집에서 내보내야 한다고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: He said that because he wanted the babies to die
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아기들이 죽기를 원했기 때문에 그렇게 말했습니다
